title: Create Pod with Node Selector
description: Create a Pod named ||node-selector-pod|| using image ||nginx:1.20-alpine|| with nodeSelector for nodes labeled with ||disktype=ssd|| in the ||jupiter|| namespace.

validations.command: kubectl get pod node-selector-pod -n jupiter -o jsonpath='{.spec.nodeSelector.disktype}'
validations.description: Pod should have nodeSelector for disktype=ssd
